mapper.select: SELECT sh.id, sh.ipv4, d.id AS device, d.name AS deviceName, sh.cdt FROM ii_sign_history sh INNER JOIN m_devices d ON d.id = sh.device ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{page.limit} OFFSET #{page.offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ii_sign_history(ipv4, ua, device, uid) VALUES(#{ipv4}, #{ua}, #{device}, #{uid})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ii_sign_history WHERE uid = #{uid}
